data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Toroitich, Faith J., Ueckermann, Edward A., Theron, Pieter D., Knapp, Markus (2009): The tetranychid mites (Acari: Tetranychidae) of Kenya and a redescription of the species Peltanobia erasmusi Meyer (Acari: Tetranychidae) based on males. Zootaxa 2176: 33-47, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189364
